CruiseShips.Name: Jewel of The Seas
CruiseShips.Description: Welcome aboard a ship designed to unlock new discoveries around the Caribbean. You’re sailing to sun-kissed shores in the Caribbean, cruising from Miami or Port Canaveral home to beautiful beaches, Jewel of the Seas® is all about expanding your worldview. In between adventures on land, you’ll find all kinds of ways to wind down or turn up on deck.
